item.description:
Bette O' has invited all CRIBBAGE players, maximum of 30, to join her at Constitution Marina, 28 Constitution Road in Charlestown at the Deck.

There are BBQ grills available, Marriott Residence outside dining, or BROWN BAG it. OR, I can bring Framingham Bakery Pizza for whoever is interested (and this is not your usual everyday pizza).

Parking after 5 p.m. is $7 for the evening (Warren Street end) , unless you can find on street parking near Marriott :)

http://www.constituti...

Bring a sweater as August nights on the waterfront can be cold and don't forget your cribbage boards as you still might be able to skunk Micki on that evening - - I don't think so Gabe :)
item.name: SPECIAL Boston Harbor Cribbage Meet Up
